metadata.title: CVE-2017-5490 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in the theme-name fallbackfunctionality in wp-includes/class-wp-theme.php in WordPress before 4.7.1allows remote attackers to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via acrafted directory name of a theme, related towp-admin/includes/class-theme-installer-skin.php.

criterions.comment: wordpress package in xenial is affected and needs fixing.
